entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening then diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
